A4.text: Ronald Wilson Reagan (February 6, 1911 â€“ June 5, 2004) was an American politician who served as the 40th president of the United States from 1981 to 1989.

A5.text: In the 1984 presidential election, Reagan was elected to a second term upon defeating former vice president Walter Mondale in one of the largest landslide victories in American history.
